body:
SCHEDULED

Features and Enhancements

Compare Networks
  • Updates to Network Strength to include Strength Ratings
    • View additional information on the Help page.
    • Download a pdf with more information here.
  • Population files cannot be used for Network Strength Ratings
Network Builder and Optimizer
  • Filter cost and quality setup dropdowns by category
  • Revert last history step
  • Copy a network model
  • Improve Find Providers By Group Results View
  • Add Alternate names in Find Providers By Group Results View
  • Allow right click on a group in NBO Find Providers to open in a new tab
Groups and Tax IDs
  • Enhance the logic that chooses a name for a tax_id to take into account hospitals
New user experience
  • Updated new user email confirmation verbiage
  • Updated verbiage on expired confirmation token page
